author: Rick Spilman
content: And it turns out that they have at least one case of coronavirus onboard after all.

author: Richard
content: They are finally going to Cambodia. A pretty crazy cruise.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
The report I have read said that the Thai authorities were happy to have the ship dock for fuel and provisions only.
One passenger had tweeted that she was concerned about her increase in weight due to the lack of shoreside activity, despite having cut out the desert course from her lunchtime meal.
Sounds like desperate measures to me.

author: Willy
content:
One heck of a way to get an extended cruise.
What would have been nice in the article is how long until the ship has until it must refuel, or get food for the passengers?
